FuncDef:
The ifg command configures the inter-frame gap (IFG).
The undo ifg command restores the default IFG. The ifg command configures the inter-frame gap (IFG). The undo ifg command restores the default IFG. By default, the IFG is 12 bytes.
ParentView: Layer 2 100GE interface view,100GE interface view,Layer 2 10GE interface view,10GE interface view,Layer 2 200GE interface view,200GE interface view,25GE-L2 view,25GE interface view,400GE-L2 view,400GE interface view,Layer 2 50GE interface view,50GE interface view,Interface group view

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IFG.
The value is an integer that ranges from 8 to 16, in bytes.
